name: Kira Edgar Final Project
description:
Hey There! Thanks for checking out my 2D puzzle platformer.

The goal of the game is to reach the final door. To accomplish that, you will have to hop, swing, and teleport your way down a series of platforming levels.

You can use WASD keys to move left and right, spacebar to jump, and f and r to change the length of ropes. Have fun!
